testsuite.name: MusicAdvisorTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #2
There are no categories in correct format on "category" action
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Arguments: -access http://127.0.0.1:45678 -resource http://127.0.0.1:56789
> auth use this link to request the access code: http://127.0.0.1:45678/authorize?client_id=a3e4f74865d14a73a404ae290820edd2&response_type=code&redirect_uri=http://localhost:8080 waiting for code... Tester: making requests to redirect uri: http://localhost:8080 Tester: Error: HTTP/1.1 header parser received no bytes > categories Please, provide access for application.
